Package ru.nsu.masolygin

Class Participant

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.masolygin.Participant
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dealer, Player
public abstract class Participant extends Object
Abstract class for a blackjack game participant. Contains common functionality for player and dealer.

    Participant(String name)
    Creates a new participant with the specified name.
